Hi Misty,
 
Thank you for that post.  I do not know everyone here but I would do  the 
same thing all over again.  And all I said was that his comment was  rude and to 
take it to a private email and not on this public forum for all to  see.  It 
is all a matter of respecting each other.
 
Jeff
